thread.title: Old time Elegance
thread.title_full: Old time Elegance - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: bus_traveler_c
title: Old time Elegance
text: We stayed at the Roosevelt Hotel for 5 nights for our Wedding Anniversary. The beautiful reception area is really impressive with a nice bar where you can have table service if you want. The reception staff are friendly and helpful and our room was quiet clean and the bed was extremely comfortable, the Hotel is in an extremely central location. We loved it here.
